title: Theory of Evolution - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/11/19
itunes:title: Theory of Evolution - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/11/19
description:
George Noory and Dr. Jeffrey Lyons explore his research into the theory of evolution, and why he believes that many scientists today are finally questioning whether that theory is actually true.

content:encoded:
George Noory and Dr. Jeffrey Lyons explore his research into the theory of evolution, and why he believes that many scientists today are finally questioning whether that theory is actually true.

itunes:summary: A scientist proposes that Darwin's theory of human evolution is wrong.
